forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 13C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. High around 55F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds. Low 4C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear. Low 39F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Wind increasing. A few clouds from time to time. High around 15C. Winds N at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. Becoming windy during the afternoon. High 58F. Winds N at 20 to 30 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low near 5C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 41F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High near 15C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 59F. Winds N at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 7C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low around 45F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and some clouds. High 14C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High 56F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low around 45F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 12C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High 54F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low near 5C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early with showers developing late. Low 41F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 12C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 53F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 41F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 12C. SSE winds shifting to W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 53F. SE winds shifting to W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 41F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. High 57F. S winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph.
